Data_title: LTER Brasschaat, Belgium, vegetation data 1996-2017
Data_description: Vegetation survey data of the 2 ha Scots pine (Pinus sylvestris L.) plantation at the LTER site Brasschaat (LTER_EU_BE_001), Belgium. The percentage cover of vascular plant and moss species was recorded on 10 x 10 m (100 m²) permanently marked subplots between the years 1996 and 2017. Abundance from 0 - 100%

Data_title: Ground vegetation data from the ICP Forests Level II plot at Sonian Forest - Belgium (https://deims.org/0fa0d44f-5314-405f-a647-a7dda423031f) for the years 1996-2012
Data_description: Ground vegetation data from the ICP Forests Level II plot at Sonian Forest - Belgium (https://deims.org/0fa0d44f-5314-405f-a647-a7dda423031f) for the years 1996-2012

Data_title: Ground vegetation data ICP Forests Level II plot Gontrode
Data_description: Vegetation survey data on permanently marked subplots (100 m²) of the LTER site Gontrode (BE03) between the years 1996 and 2017.  All vascular plant and terrestrial moss species occurring at the subplots were recorded and their percentage cover was estimated. Woody species were assigned to three different vegetation strata depending on their height: herb layer (< 50 cm), shrub layer (≥ 50 cm and < 5 m) and tree layer (≥ 5 m).Abundance from 0 - 100%

Data_description: Data on wintering water birds at nine sites in Bulgaria for the years 1976-2017. Public data provided by the Executive Environment Agency (ExEA), of the Ministry of Environment and Water, Bulgaria. Notes: Data are reported as presence/absence in plots that were surveyed in three landscape types. For each landscape:year we computed the frequency of occurrence of each species in the plots, and used that value to compute biodiversity metrics. We then combined the obtained biodiversity trends obtained for the three landscape types using meta-analysis mixed models (see main text).
